entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries or rain showers ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this evening then light overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries except showers along parts of the coast overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 27 December 2022
